name: SafeTour Corporation
description:
SafeTour Corp. is a game where you are a security agent that has to make some areas visitable. The goal is to find a loop in every level and to walk it 3 times. The main challenge is the optical effects that are occuring, and it is not often easy to see a real route in a level. This game was developed for the Black & White Game Jam #8.

Note : unfortunately I didn't manage to build the game for browser, so you'll have to download it, i'm sorry.
